comments:
1. Run a debug session on an existing server
2. Finalize the debug session
3. Delete the server from the php servers list
4. Run same configuration again (from history list)
5. Open debug configuration dialog -->

*** Bug 192144 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Fixed.
We allow deleting without any prompting, but when trying to execute the launch 
configuration we check for the server's existance and prompt the user about the 
error. 
Then, the launch configuration dialog is opened to allow a different server 
selection.

The part where the launch configuration dialog is opened to allow a different 
server selection is not working currently
Closing this bug as it works fine
